tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_trends_gmo (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    consumer_preference VARCHAR(50),
    market_trend VARCHAR(100),
    date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    market_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    market_demand INT
);

CREATE TABLE consumer_preferences (
    consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProductSales (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    market_segment VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trend_description TEXT,
    market_share DECIMAL(5,2),
    trend_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ConsumerPreferences (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    product_preference VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    purchase_frequency INT,
    purchase_history JSONB,
    preference_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProductDetails (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    product_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id UUID,
    price DECIMAL(8,2),
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierInformation (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    website_url VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE SalesHistory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount INT,
    discount_applied DECIMAL(3,2),
    sale_location VARCHAR(100)
);
